:::Wheeljack:::

::He sees Composer::
Wheeljack: Hey Composer, nice to see you. Ive been continuously working with 
Vamprah here to get her ready to infiltrate the Maximals. Just take a look at 
her, that disguise is foolproof dont you think?

--part1_46.19de57f3.28c1b45a_boundary
